name: Sweet Land
description:
Sweet Land is a platform game with shooting, based on a  candy kingdom in which you have to collect ingredients, kill enemies and stop a revolution from the healthy food that threatens our world.

Juicy Games team:

  • Alison "Neffesh" Cabrera: Main programmer.
  • Cristina Santainés: Main artist.
  • Ricard Llado: Secondary artist, sounds.
  • Diego Flores: Secondary artist, technical artis, secondary
